sentences.en: He published only three slim volumes of verse in his short life.
sentences.cn: 在他短暂的一生里，他只出版过3卷薄薄的诗集。

sentences.en: He recited a verse of the twenty-third psalm.
sentences.cn: 他背诵了《诗篇》第23篇中的一节。

sentences.en: He used to declaim French verse to us.
sentences.cn: 他过去常给我们朗诵法语诗歌。

sentences.en: He wrote reams ( and reams ) of verse.
His book was in parts written in verse.
sentences.cn: 他的书有许多地方是用韵文写的.

sentences.en: His verse has the sing - song rhythm of a poetaster.
sentences.cn: 他的诗句有着蹩脚诗人的单调的节律.

sentences.en: I have been moved to write a few lines of verse.
sentences.cn: 我因感动而写下了几句诗。

sentences.en: It was a verse from the book of Job. It was so apropos.
sentences.cn: 这是摘自乔布书中的一句诗，用得非常恰当。

sentences.en: It was in blank verse that she sang.
Latin verse remained completely incomprehensible to me.
sentences.cn: 拉丁语的诗歌我仍然一点都不懂.

sentences.en: Learn the first two verses of the poem by heart.
sentences.cn: 把这首诗的头两节背下来。

sentences.en: Let’s sing the last verse again.
sentences.cn: 我们把最后一节再唱一遍吧。

sentences.en: Most of the play is written in verse, but some of it is in prose.
sentences.cn: 这剧本大部分是用韵文写的，不过有一些是用散文。

sentences.en: The poet fell in love with her and immortalized her in his verse.
sentences.cn: 诗人爱上了她，并以诗歌使她名传后世。

sentences.en: The verse rose up to fire his breast with inspiration.
sentences.cn: 这首诗激发了他的灵感。

sentences.en: This verse describes three signs of spring.
sentences.cn: 这节诗描绘了春天来临的三个征兆。
